main event: A sighting of a huge object passing through the sky, accompanied by a swooshing sound, was reported in Colorado on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was large and made a sound like a ball of fire., It descended towards the horizon and was estimated to have landed 200-300 miles away., The observation lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., Additional reports of similar sightings in the area may exist., The sighting occurred at midnight.
witness description: The witness reported being around 60 years old and observed the object during a regular check.
